about_the_game:
Lucky Gems


Lucky Gems is an innovative casual game that lets you work with various sprites in a beautiful gem world, collecting gems of different colors and shapes. The gameplay is simple and fun, but not without challenges. You have to recruit various sprites, expand your gem territory, collect shiny crystals, and make the sprites cooperate to harvest gems. However, gem collection is not smooth sailing, you have to allocate resources wisely, and also rely on luck’s favor.
This is a game suitable for all ages and preferences, it can let you relax in your spare time, and start your gem journey!
